product.description:
Soft Padding, Shaped To Feel Great On Your Hands Protects Finish 

Material : Leather., Soft wearable leather.

A better grip on the steering wheel gives you more control on the road.

Skid proof, stable, heat resistant put some style in your ride

top_reviews.title: Comfortable
top_reviews.body: Purchased it for Tata Punch steering wheel and it was easy to install. The grip and comfort is phenomenal. There was a tag on the lower portion of the steering wheel which could have been avoided but overall very good.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Purchased it for Tata Punch steering wheel and it was easy to install. The grip and comfort is phenomenal. There was a tag on the lower portion of the steering wheel which could have been avoided but overall very good.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Perfectly fit on tata tigor
top_reviews.body: The media could not be loaded. Perfectly fit in tata tigor, good grip. Need to struggle bit to make sure the stearing chin fits perfectly. Good grip. Must recommend and value for moneyRead more
top_reviews.body_html:
The media could not be loaded.
 Perfectly fit in tata tigor, good grip.

top_reviews.title: Fits for Magnite!
top_reviews.body: Product look & feel: The stiching, look and feel are awesome. The red color inserts look perfect like a racing car! Personally i loved it when added over the steering wheel.  Fit & Finish: But, the fit is kind of loose which makes turning slippery, just a little bit 0.01%  Package: Came with good packaging. Protected with enough cover.  Damage: No  Recommended: YesRead more
top_reviews.body_html:
Product look & feel:
The stiching, look and feel are awesome. The red color inserts look perfect like a racing car!
Personally i loved it when added over the steering wheel.

Fit & Finish:
But, the fit is kind of loose which makes turning slippery, just a little bit 0.01%

Package:
Came with good packaging. Protected with enough cover.

Damage: No

Recommended: Yes

top_reviews.title: Value for money steering cover
top_reviews.body: I went to a offline store and they asked 1K for the product, few days later I was browsing Amazon and found this steering cover which actually matches to the colour of my car and I am delighted with it :).Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I went to a offline store and they asked 1K for the product, few days later I was browsing Amazon and found this steering cover which actually matches to the colour of my car and I am delighted with it :).

top_reviews.title: Superb grip cover!! Just buy. You won't regret
top_reviews.body: The product is really good providing superb grip and comfort. I bought the black colour which gives me so good steering wheel feedback that i feel the ultimate comfort. Just go for it as it supports all the new TATA cars with flat bottom.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:

top_reviews.title: Perfect fit, Easy to Install and value for money
top_reviews.body: Fits perfectly for Nexon D shaped steering wheel. Initially they wrongly delivered round one and I requested for replacement. Pros... Looks good, perfect fit, easy to install by self. Cons... nothing except the logo label at the bottom which could look odd and catches dirt...Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Fits perfectly for Nexon D shaped steering wheel. Initially they wrongly delivered round one and I requested for replacement.
Pros... Looks good, perfect fit, easy to install by self.
Cons... nothing except the logo label at the bottom which could look odd and catches dirt...
Read more

top_reviews.title: Good fit for flat bottom steering wheel of Altroz
top_reviews.body: The product is good for use. Offers plenty of grip for me over the standard steering wheel. The inside is rubberized to hold on to the steering wheel. The brand tag on the wheel however is an eye sore. It is stitched into the wheel and I don't appreciate it. Maybe provide it somewhere it won't be visible after fitment.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
The product is good for use. Offers plenty of grip for me over the standard steering wheel. The inside is rubberized to hold on to the steering wheel. The brand tag on the wheel however is an eye sore. It is stitched into the wheel and I don't appreciate it. Maybe provide it somewhere it won't be visible after fitment.
Read more

top_reviews.title: GOOD FOR TIAGO
top_reviews.body: I Purchased for Tata Tiago XZAPLUS 2021 model..Cover quality fitting everything fine completely satisfied ..In two places stiches found opened..remaining is perfect..buy it..Read more
